articles.author: Angeline Jane Bernabe
articles.title: Kevin Costner steps out with kids at 'Horizon' film premiere in Los Angeles - Good Morning America
articles.description: Kevin Costner and more attended the "Horizon" film premiere in Los Angeles on Monday night.
articles.content:
Kevin Costner made the "Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1" film premiere a family affair.
The actor was all smiles as he posed for photos and walked the carpet in Los Angeles on Monday night.
